Title: Relates to replacing the term "visitation" with the term "parenting time" in various laws related to child custody
Summary: Amends provisions of various sections of law to change the term "visitation" to "parenting time" regarding custody orders.
LawCode: Amd Dom Rel L, generally; amd Fam Ct Act, generally
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the family court act, in relation to changing the denotation of visitation to parenting time
